item.description:
Wheel of the Year

The Wheel of the Year is a continuing cycle of life, death and rebirth. Thus the Wheel reflects both the natural passage of life in the world and the revealing of connections with the greater world. By realizing how all are connected to the turning of the seasons we come to a deeper understanding of the ways we are connected to the God and Goddess. When they celebrate seasonal rites Wiccans attempt to unite the essential identity that underlies all things.

Class starts at 6PM followed by Open Circle at 7:30PM
item.name: Class & Open Circle - Wheel of the Year
